body:
7 months ago... I was immature. I had no idea what combat logging was (until I got banned several times for it). I was posted a lifetime ban on this server and it broke my heart. I have not forgot about this server until I saw a YouTube vid by Porkyyy and it made me want to come back to the wonderful avicus community. Playing other servers for a while has taught me proper behavior and I would like another chance from this wonderful staff to become a part of the community again! So I would ask for a reply for a staff member so I can see if I can end my long ban. Thank you!



                                                   -Sport_dude_8888

title: My ban

replies.body: Hope you can come back! I haven't talked to you in ages so it'd be great to have ya back! 7 months is a really long time, so I am 99% sure you'll be appealed :D
replies.body_tagged: Hope you can come back! I haven't talked to you in ages so it'd be great to have ya back! 7 months is a really long time, so I am 99% sure you'll be appealed :D

replies.body: Appeal under the sub forum ' Appeal an Infraction"
